name: Water Stance
text: The next 2 times you would take damage, deal that damage to the source of the damage instead\n\nAt the start of your turn, you may return a Stance to your hand. Only one Stance can be in play attached to you.

name: Fire Stance
text: Whenever you would deal damage, deal that + 2 fire damage instead. Whenever you take damage, take 1 additinal fire damage\n\nAt the start of your turn, you may return a Stance to your hand. Only one Stance can be in play attached to you.

name: Earth Stance
text: Increase your physical armor by 1. You cannot be moved by enemy abilities\n\nAt the start of your turn, you may return a Stance to your hand. Only one Stance can be in play attached to you

name: Wind Stance
text: You are dodging. You may take one free move action on each of your turns.\n\nAt the start of your turn, you may return a Stance to your hand. Only one Stance can be in play attached to you

name: One Inch Punch
text: Deal 3 damage to an adjacent enemy, then you may move that enemy.\n\nIf you are in Fire Stance, this is a Minor action instead.

name: Mighty Stomp
text: Deal 1 irreducible damage to adjacent enemies. They lose one Major action on their next turns. \n\nIf you are in Earth Stance, this is a Minor action instead.

name: Ura Shuto
text: Deal 2 damage to an adjacent enemy. The next Major action they take targets themselves if possible.\n\nIf you are in Water Stance, this is a Minor action instead.

name: Shukuchi
text:
Attach this to your character for one turn.

You cannot be targeted by enemy actions.

If you are in Air Stance, this is a Minor action instead.

name: Aura Burst
text: Put up to 4 cards from your deck into your discard.\n\n Deal 2+2*n damage to target adjacent enemy and each enemy on their file.

name: Touch of Death
text: Deal 4 damage to an adjacent enemy. If this would reduce them to less than 3 health, destroy them instead.

name: Meditate
text: Shuffle up to 10 cards of your choice from your discard into your deck. Exhaust.

name: Focus Energy
text: Attach this to your character until you next deal damage.\n\nYou deal double damage.

name: Earthforged
text:
Detatch all Enhancements from a weapon you're wielding. Then, attach this to that weapon.

That weapon gains 'All damage done with this weapon ignores armor.'

Then, attack with that weapon.

name: Stormhammer
text:
Detatch all Enhancements from a weapon you're wielding. Then, attach this to that weapon.

That weapon gains 'Whenever this weapon deals damage, gain 1 Momentum.'

Then, attack with that weapon.

name: Flametongue
text:
Detatch all Enhancements from a weapon you're wielding. Then, attach this to that weapon.

That weapon gains 'Whenever this weapon deals damage, deal an additional 2 Fire damage.'

Then, attack with that weapon.

name: Twin Slam
text: Attack with each of your equipped Melee Weapons.

name: Chain Lightning
text: Deal 3 lightning damage to any 3 targets.\n\nGain 2 Momentum.

name: Stoneward
text: Detatch all Enhancements from your armor. Then, attach this to your armor.\n\nIt gains 'Reduce physical damage taken by 1'.

name: Grace of Air
text: Detatch all Enhancements from your armor. Then, attach this to your armor.\n\nIt gains 'At the start of your turn, gain 1 Momentum.'

name: Lava Blast
text: Costs 4 Momentum.\n\nDeal 8 fire damage to all enemies in any file.

name: Cleansing Water
text: Restore 2 HP to any target. If you have 4 or more Momentum, restore 6 HP instead.
